urlencoded.description: Text (128), required; accepted values: SALE, REFUND_SALE, CANCEL
Text (20), required; transaction amount, the last two digits are always decimal places, in this example it is 100.25
Text (3), required; ISO 4217 alphabetic code of the transaction currency

urlencoded.value: Flat 6 Primrose Rise 347 Lavender Road Northampton GB
urlencoded.description: Text (100), required; customer's combined full address, that is Line 2 + Line 1 + City + Province + Country
Text (2), required; ISO 3166 Alpha-2 code of the customer's country

urlencoded.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/104.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

urlencoded.description: Text (32), required; your merchant account ID provided by Pixxles
Text (64), not required; order reference number
Text (128), required; customer's IP address, currently only IPv4 is accepted, IPv6 may be declined
Text, hash generated using signatureKey provided by Pixxles
Text (48), required; your unique transaction identifier
